0.text: Innate: Veigar generates a stack of Phenomenal Evil for each enemy  champion hit by his abilities, and 5 stacks whenever he scores an enemy champion  takedown.
0.html: Innate: Veigar generates a stack of Phenomenal Evil for each enemy champion hit by his abilities, and 5 stacks whenever he scores an enemy champion takedown.

1.text: Phenomenal Evil: For each stack, Veigar gains  1 ability power.
1.html: Phenomenal Evil: For each stack, Veigar gains  1 ability power.

0.text: Active: Veigar blasts a dark bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Veigar blasts a dark bolt in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

1.text: If this kills an enemy, it generates 1 stack of  Phenomenal Evil, tripled against large  minions and  monsters.
1.html: If this kills an enemy, it generates 1 stack of Phenomenal Evil, tripled against large minions and monsters.

0.text: Active: Veigar casts down a mass of dark matter that strikes the target location after a 1.221 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.
0.html: Active: Veigar casts down a mass of dark matter that strikes the target location after a 1.221 seconds delay, dealing magic damage to enemies hit.

1.text: Dark Matter's cooldown is  reduced based on stacks of  Phenomenal Evil.
1.html: Dark Matter's cooldown is  reduced based on stacks of Phenomenal Evil.

0.text: Active: Veigar forms a cage at the target location that erects after a 0.5 second delay, and remains for 3 seconds. Enemies that collide with the edges of the cage are  knocked down and  stunned for a duration.
0.html: Active: Veigar forms a cage at the target location that erects after a 0.5 second delay, and remains for 3 seconds. Enemies that collide with the edges of the cage are knocked down and stunned for a duration.

1.text: Enemies can only be affected by Event Horizon's effects once per cast.
1.html: Enemies can only be affected by Event Horizon's effects once per cast.

0.text: Active: Veigar sends a primordial burst at the target enemy champion that deals magic damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on target's missing health).

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

Keywords

  • dring

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+70 ability power
+20 ability haste
+250 health
+600 mana

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to all enemies hit and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies struck in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10 ability power.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
